record.text:
Pretty cool to see James Gunn in the Forever Blue Sky.

ðŸ¤ž May your experience with this platform be better than your last.

images.alt:
Seriously, @jamesgunn.  You've touched all of our hearts and I hope Blue Sky is kind to you.

Guardians 3 was a great swan song and a great movie.  

It's especially touching for all of us dog/cat lovers.

It was the last movie I got to enjoy with my oldest pug Cooper before he passed from oral cancer.  This scene turned me into a blubbery mess.  And I thank you for it.

Thank you for making movies that warm hearts and wet eyes.

Keep on keeping on.

May your 2nd chance go better than your first.
